trans-unit.source: Implements the `GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly` task.
trans-unit.target: 实现`GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly`任务。

trans-unit.source: Use the `GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly` element in your project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: 使用`GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly`项目文件以创建和执行此任务中的元素。

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关用法和参数信息，请参阅[GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the short name of the assembly that is generated for a project and is also the name of the target assembly that is temporarily generated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置为项目生成和也是临时生成的目标程序集的名称的程序集的短名称。

trans-unit.source: The short name of the assembly that is generated for a project and is also the name of the target assembly that is temporarily generated.
trans-unit.target: 为项目生成和也是临时生成的目标程序集的名称的程序集短名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the MS Build target name which is used to generate assembly from source code files.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于从源代码文件中生成程序集的 MS Build 目标名称。

trans-unit.source: The MS Build target name which is used to generate assembly from source code files.
trans-unit.target: 用于从源代码文件中生成程序集 MS Build 目标名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the appropriate item name which can be accepted by managed compiler task.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可以接受由托管的编译器任务的合适的项目名称。

trans-unit.source: The appropriate item name which can be accepted by managed compiler task.
trans-unit.target: 可以接受由托管的编译器任务合适的项目名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the full path of current project file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前项目文件的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: The full path of current project file.
trans-unit.target: 当前项目文件的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: Executes a task.
trans-unit.target: 执行任务。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the task executed successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果成功，则执行任务否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of generated code files.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置生成的代码文件的列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of generated code files.
trans-unit.target: 生成的代码文件的列表。

trans-unit.source: This can have 0 items.
trans-unit.target: 这可以具有 0 个项。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the directory that the temporary target assembly is generated to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置为生成的临时目标程序集的目录。

trans-unit.source: The directory that the temporary target assembly is generated to.
trans-unit.target: 为生成的临时目标程序集的目录。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the MS Build binary path.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 MS Build 二进制路径。

trans-unit.source: The MS Build binary path.
trans-unit.target: MS Build 二进制路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of resolved reference assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置已解析的引用程序集的列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of resolved reference assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 已解析的引用程序集的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the item name which is used to keep the Reference list in managed compiler task.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于让中托管的编译器任务的引用列表的项名称。

trans-unit.source: The item name which is used to keep the Reference list in managed compiler task.
trans-unit.target: 项名称用于在托管的编译器任务中保留引用列表。
